level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2 [ยง 2-501 et seq.], may issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

The Mayor may bring an action in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia to enjoin the violation or threatened violation of any provision of this chapter or of any rules promulgated under this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-289
level.text: For history of Law 18-289, see notes under ยง 8-2201.
